name: Surgical Services
description: They offer general and specialized surgeries, and minimally invasive endoscopy procedures. Many of them are available on a same-day, outpatient basis. Talk with your healthcare providers to discuss what services may be right for you and to get a referral.
fullDescription: They offer general and specialized surgeries, and minimally invasive endoscopy procedures. Many of them are available on a same-day, outpatient basis. Talk with your healthcare providers to discuss what services may be right for you and to get a referral.

howToGetIt: 845 Jackson Street, 5/F San Francisco, CA 94133 Mon – Fri: 8:30 a.m. – 5:30 p.m. 1-415-677-2350
